summary: Tony had the arc reactor removed from his chest in IM3.
body:
I think y'all are forgetting that…

Tony had the arc reactor removed from his chest in IM3.

Remember how bad of a place he was in during that movie? Pepper sure as hell remembers and that’s likely why she makes the comment that people are dubbing her a bitch for making in Infinity War. The “you should have shirts in your closet” line. She simply does not want him falling down the rabbit hole again and back into that dark place but no. She is a complete toxic bitch for worrying about the man she loves. Am I right?

blog.name: clintbartonruinedmylife
blog.title: Clint Barton/Hawkeye Support Group
blog.description:
Hello, my name is Katja and I have a Clint Barton problem! If you have a problem, too, come in, we have coffee and pizza. :D

If you want me to write a ficlet you can prompt me :D

Main blog / AO3

I'm a broke writer. If you like my stuff, buy me a coffee?

Buy me a coffee

summary: Can I ask for a fic? Clint is some sort of mythical creature and has to tell his lover before it gets serious between them....
question: Can I ask for a fic? Clint is some sort of mythical creature and has to tell his lover before it gets serious between them. Ironhawk or Winterhawk please...
answer:
Clint had to admit he was nervous. It was the first time in centuries that he was with someone who was more than just a fling but before it got serious he had to tell him. Tony was awesome and he loved him and he didn’t want to start a relationship with a lie.

When he heard the knock he almost jumped out of his skin but then he went to the door and opened it. Tony stood outside and smiled when he saw him.

“Hey,” Clint said and stepped aside. “Come in.”

“Hey,” Tony said, his voice low and seductive and he reached for Clint’s hand. “Missed me?” They went for a coffee earlier that day and since then Clint had paced and deliberated if and how he should tell Tony. But it was important that he knew who Clint was.

“I… uh…” he started and stopped, when he saw tiny wrinkles appear on Tony’s forehead. “No, it’s not… I… I just have to tell you something.”

“Okay,” Tony said. He didn’t let go of his hands and Clint led him over to the couch where they both sat down.

“It’s something you should know and…” he took a deep breath. “Since… since all of this started, since you came out to the public as Iron Man lots of shit happened. We’ve seen gods and monsters and aliens and mutants and really weird shit, right?”

“Clint, what’s up?” Tony said. “If it’s…”

“No, it’s about me,” Clint interrupted him.

“You’re gonna break up with me?” Tony asked and moved back an inch or two.

“What?” Clint blurted. “Don’t be ridiculous. I would never break up with you. It’s just… there’s something you need to know about me and… and I don’t want this to get serious without you knowing, you know.”

“You’re married?” Tony guessed but Clint shook his head.

“No,” he huffed and then took a deep breath before Tony could continue guessing. “It’s… what I am,” he said then.

“What you are?” Tony frowned.

“You know… Thor… Thor is not human and… and that’s okay, isn’t it?” Clint said. His mouth was dry and his tongue seemed to stick to the roof of his mouth. He’s never been so nervous in centuries.

“Of course it’s okay, but…” Tony started but Clint interrupted him.

“I’m not human, too,” he blurted and then swallowed hard. “I’m… I’m not… not like… like Thor but…”

“Clint,” Tony interrupted his stammering and took his hands again. “Look at me.” Clint obeyed. “Take a deep breath now.” He did. “And now tell me.”

“Okay, I’m not like Thor, but… but I’m not a human. And… and maybe I’m a little bit older than I look like,” he said. He could feel the heat in the tips of his ears and licked his lips nervously.

“Okay,” Tony said then. “Can you… do you want to… uhm… show me?”

“Right,” Clint said and took another deep breath. “Don’t… uh… don’t forget it’s still me, okay?”

“Okay,” Tony said. Clint rose and made a few steps back, removed shirt and pants, much to Tony’s delight, concentrated and lifted the glamour he used to keep his true nature hidden. From one moment to the next his legs up to his navel were furry, his feet were hooves, he had pointed ears and goat horns came out of his head. Tony sat there, stared, mouth agape and literally had no idea what to say.

“I’m… uh… I’m a faun,” Clint said and gestured at his legs with both hands. “That’s… uh… that’s me.”

“Wha… how?” Tony eventually managed. He rose, too, and came over to Clint.

“It’s called a glamour,” he said. “We use it so we can walk amongst humans.” He didn’t move when Tony walked around him.

“Oh my god, is that…” Tony blurted when he saw the goats tail on his backside.

“Yes, it is,” Clint said and felt the heat in his cheeks.

“Can I…” Tony asked when he came around and Clint nodded. Slowly and carefully he touched Clint’s hip. “Soft,” he murmured. The fur was silky and Tony let his fingers run through it.

“Can you please say something?” Clint whispered. Tony looked up at him, licked his lips and then closed the distance between them and kissed him.

“I love you, Clint,” he said. “So, you’re not human. Who cares? You have hooves and horns and that adorable little tail but… you’re still you and… I love you.”

Clint felt a tear of happiness run over his face.

“I love you, too,” he said. And then he kissed him again.

tags: hopefully this will actually post this time
summary: turn back the clock (and I’ll try again in the morning)
title: turn back the clock (and I’ll try again in the morning)
body:
Peter gets stuck in a time loop. In it, he lives through some of his worst nightmares, only to wake up that morning and have no one remember. He needs Tony to help him get through.

And if that isn’t bad enough, his identity is revealed over and over, every day.

Chapter 1

Part of the 2019 Irondad Big Bang, in collaboration with the unbelievably talented @starlight-sparks (who drew the gorgeous picture above) and @the-reverse-mermaid

And if that isn’t bad enough, his identity is revealed over and over, every day.

summary: It's That Easy
title: It's That Easy
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2XH1PFb

by NotEvenCloseToStraight

After an emotional break up with Alpha!Harry, Omega!Peter is determined to find his own way in the world.
A heat that comes on too quickly lands him at Weasel’s bar, the domain of one very Alpha Wade Wilson, who takes one look at Peter and knows they they are meant to be mates.
Wade doesn’t think Peter wants to be matched with an Alpha at all, much less an Alpha that looks like him, so he keeps things platonic, ignoring his feelings so Peter feels safe.
Peter wants more from the Alpha than just a text messages and hilarious-but-inappropriate jokes and over drinks one night, he asks Wade to share his next heat.
Was finding real love as easy as a chance meeting at a crappy bar?

~~~
“He wants me to hold him.” Wade folded his arms and ducked his chin. “I don’t know how to do that.”

“I can google it for you?” Weasel shrugged. “But you just sorta put your arms around him and squeeze. Kindergarten stuff, right?”

The Alpha scowled. "I want to hold him, I just can’t.”

“Oh you mean because of the old avocado hate f*cking another avocado thing?” Weasel pointed to Wades face. “Don’t sweat it, I hear millennials love avocados. He should be fine.”

"You’re the worst.”

summary: marvel/iron man au where peggy carter discovers the less than child-friendly environment that tony is living in and decides to...
body:
marvel/iron man au where peggy carter discovers the less than child-friendly environment that tony is living in and decides to take action.

she is horrified at how howard has devolved since steve went into the ice, and how he’s put cap on an impossibly high pedastal that tony will never be able to reach no matter what. steve would never have stood for that, and peggy carter certainly wont either, so she and jarvis work together to smuggle tony out of the estate before they can take proper action.

it works, because peggy and jarvis are an unstoppable team, and howard suddenly finds himself with a ‘missing’ kid and one hell of a lawsuit. of course, howard stark is used to dealing with legalities. stark enterprises has deep pockets, but peggy carter will not back down, and shield has arms that reach even further than howards money.

so the case goes to court, tried by a judge untouched by howards bribes and threats of power, and becomes one of the biggest kept secrets in history.

its a battle, but eventually, peggy is given sole custody. tony has two parents, of course, but howard will not be allowed to have contact with tony, and in order for maria to gain full custody of tony and have that requirement fulfilled, she will have to divorce howard. howard can either give up his son, or give up his son, marriage, and image in the inevitably messy, public divorce proceedings.

it is an unfortunately simple choice, and anthony edward stark, the poor, poor heir to stark industries who tragically passed away in a motor vehicle accident at the tender age of four and a half, becomes antonio edwin carter, who has a good, proper life raised by people who love him and encorage him.

title: Oh, Little One, You Just Need to be Brave - mainstreamelectricalparade - Iron Man (Movies) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Rhodey rounded the corner into the living room, closely followed by Peter, who was looking down at his feet as he held onto Rhodey’s hand, and didn’t see Tony right away.

He looked sadder than Tony had ever seen him.

Rhodey crouched down to Peter’s level. “Look, buddy, look who’s here for you.”

Peter’s eyes went wide, quickly filling with tears.

“Dad?” he whispered, not moving from where he stood, like his feet were rooted to the carpet.

This is an Iron Man 3 fic, which, fair warning, I haven’t actually seen. Another fair warning: THIS IS SUPER HEARTBREAKING, PREPARE YOURSELVES.

Peter’s eyes went wide, quickly filling with tears.

“Dad?” he whispered, not moving from where he stood, like his feet were rooted to the carpet.

This is an Iron Man 3 fic, which, fair warning, I haven’t actually seen. Another fair warning: THIS IS SUPER HEARTBREAKING, PREPARE YOURSELVES.

summary:
Final Avengers VII 
Chapitre II
title:
Final Avengers VII 
Chapitre II
body:
Words : 2459

Pairing : eventual Bucky Barnes x reader 

Summary:

A girl lost without memories. A new threat looming in the horizon. This time it could be the end of the line.


Let it be know that James Buchanan Barnes didn’t like morning. He didn’t like it when he was young and had to go to school, didn’t like them when he had to go to work on the dock to provide for his family. Did he liked them when he was in the war ? Absolutely not! He have an inkling that he didn’t liked them in his time with H.Y.D.R.A but he didn’t know if he had early morning back then. Maybe they just put him of his fridge and then serve him his orders. He snorted at the thought, he had come to adopt a very dark humor concerning his H.Y.D.R.A’s days as a coping mechanism. Sure it made people uncomfortable but at least he was learning to accept his past.  

But back to his hate for morning, if he didn’t like them before now he positively loath them. Does he want to wake up every morning at crack ass dawn to run with his best friend ? Nope, not at all but he could indulge Steve, plus who would says no to his fucking puppy eyes, you guessed it not Bucky. But now he has to share his breakfast with Steve’s girlfriend too and oh god is she annoying well not really annoying per se, but the fact that he is in love with her and that he can’t touch her like he want because his best friend got her first annoys him. 

She a S.H.I.E.L.D agent, named Lyanna, she is a health freak with an addiction to instagram. A bleached blonde even if she says that it’s natural. « Fuckin bottle blonde » with green eyes and her boobs are so fake they defy the law of gravity.  Yes Bucky Barnes is privy to women artifice, he used to have sisters and even back in the days women teared each other apart so he know. Nat,Wanda Pepper and even Sharon love to watch Miss America with him. He is hilarious, imagine the Winter Soldier imitating contestant and shaking his hair parroting their speeches. 

He had taken to criticizes her at every opportunities so he would not succumbs to his temptation. 

Talking about the devil, her shrill voice make him wince and exchange a knowing glance with Sam who was making his famous pancake for the team.  Of all the girls and boys the punk could have choose he had to pick this one. 

Steve put his paper journal on the counter and wait for his best girl to barge in the kitchen. 

« Steven Grant Rogers, » she roared making a beeline for him « did you know ? » she asked him tastily. Her face was red and bloated from her anger and Bucky made a really visible grimace that sent Sam in a coughing fit. 

Steve’s face is the epitome of clueless, and Lyanna doesn’t let him answer « Oh don’t act like you didn’t Steven, your ex the oh so great Sharon Carter played favorite and now I have another recruit to train with the initial 11 others » she seethed. 

But Steve failed the see a problem and tell her so and Bucky knew that he just screwed himself. « You don’t see a problem with that ? Huh of course you wouldn’t. So she add her sister in the program, a sister that didn’t partake in the pre selection but that’s not a problem because she is fucking Carter and those women are above us mere mortal! Is that what you think Steven ? Are Sharon and Danny Carter above us ? Above me ? »  She grilled him and Bucky had enough, he put is coffee in the sink and glared at her « If she doesn’t have your fucking irritating voice then yes I would say she is better than you Betty. » 

Steve looked at his retracting back with a disapproving glare. « I didn’t know she had sister doll, but I’m sure you’ll be a great teacher nonetheless » he tried to soothed her. 

Upon hearing the news that a new Carter had sprout from nowhere the Avengers had made their way to the training room. 

Tony knew that you were not really a Carter, after all Peggy has been his Godmother and Sharon was like his cousin. It was him that had made your papers, and it was for him that Sharon had asked you to share your language. So he didn’t came because you were a « Carter » but because he wanted to see Steve’s girl reaction to you.  

He was one of those who didn’t like her, Sam being the other. He know perfectly that Bucky love her, it’s so painfully obvious. But then again he is Tony Stark it’s like a 6th sense for him to know who like who. And Tony know that Lyanna love him too, maybe she want to have her supersoldier sandwich. Kids these day and their Tumblr obsession for Stucky. Steve would have a heart attack if he knew how people saw him. Bucky on the other hand would love it, he has taken to take multiples women. And he would have given Playboy Tony a run for his money. 

They were all gathered by the center mat waiting fro the group of recruits to arrive. 

Steve, Lyanna and Bucky are talking quietly, and Bucky is just behind her, touching her slightly, and Tony observe them intrigued. That is a new turn in their dynamic, they are fucking he is sure of that or at list they had fuck. Steve has red cheeks and Bucky is more relaxed that he had been for a long time. And Lyanna is positively glowing by the power of being dicked by two super soldiers. 

Son of a bitch, if he had know Steve had this in him, his bisexual ass would have have a pass at him. 

But now he was in a celibacy phase, it been two years since his latest flame, he was not in a sexual phase at all. 

Popping a berry in his mouth he took a place more secluded in the sidelines to observe the trio like one would do with an animal documentary. 

Hills was the one leading the group of new meat in the compound so Lydia was with the Avengers.  She is talking with Stevie when she spots the newcomers. 

She already know them as she was one of the persons that had handpicked them. 

But when her eyes meet your forms, her entire body stiffens. 

You are at the back of the group, there is no use for you to try to hide, you are the tallest in fact you tower them all, you even seem to have the same height than Thor himself. You’re under armor kit, cling at your body and so they can see the definition of your taunt muscles. 

Lyanna is seething, how dare you wore sunglass, one thing is sure though, you are going to regret this, she is not going to miss you. She won’t let you steal her super soldiers, Steve and Bucky are hers. 

Lyanna start with a speech, of how she is proud of the new recruits, that a new horizon lay ahead of them but Tony could her eyes zooming to you every so often. 

« Danny Carter, » she called, and you made you way to stand in front of her, hands behind your back. 

‘Huh hoh this is happening’ Tony thought as he prepared himself for the show Lyanna is about to give. He know she can be a bitch but you, you are the wild variable, he don’t know you and he surely don’t know how you would react. He only hope that you can take whatever is going to be thrown your way by the blonde harpy. 

« Do you think your attire is appropriate for training ? » she questions you, circling you like a shark would a seal. 

The others recruits start snickering at your expanse. 

Bucky and Steve are proud of the intimidating persona their girl gave off.  They love strong women and Lyanna is anything but weak.

Bucky is even turned on by her attitude. 

Steve is also judging by the prism of your ‘sister’ and ‘aunt’. You don’t look anything like them maybe you have a different father or mother he don’t know. 

You are so damn tall for a woman and your built is nothing if impressive. 

« I wasn’t aware that the training would start right now. » you answer flatly. 

« Well now you are, do I have to send you an invitation for you to remove your sunglasses » she taunted you. 

You clenched your jaw, you were already fed up with her but you had promised Shar that you would be well behaved, so you complied and removed your sunglasses. The moment the shade stop hiding your eyes your hear a loud whistle. 

« Well damn Frosty you just lost your title of the most stunning eyes to baby Carter » the man snicker, but the metal arm man stop his laugh with a slap to his head « Shuddup birdbrain. » the man seethed. 

If you thought the look she was sending you before was hostile than the one you are receiving now is straight up murderous. You just raise a brow looking down to her and apparently it was the wrong move because her glare darkened even more after that. 

« I’m curious Carter, » her saccharine tone don’t bod well for you « you made it in this program thanks to your connections while the others trainees had to undergo a grueling selection. So tell us, why are you here ? » she smile kindly at you but you don’t buy it for one second. 

You look around the gym « I’m here to train. » you answer simply as if it was the most obvious thing in the world. 

« You think you are funny huh ? » 

You don’t like the way she is toying with you, and you don’t really know how to react or what the you with memories of your life would do . « I don’t know, do you ? » you shot back titling your head to the side. You internally wince when you finally process what you had just said ‘way to go Danny’ you sigh and once again anger the woman in front of you furthermore. 

She doesn’t acknowledge you remark verbally at least.  

« Right, so do you have any hand to hand combat experience ? » 

« I don’t know » you answer trustfully, you hadn’t been brief to what you would be expected to do or to know. 

The deep scowl she was sporting slip away from her face instantly and her smile is now blinding. 

 « Maybe with fire arms ? »  again you don’t know and you state it. 

The more she grill you, the more she is pleased to see that you are not really a real threat to her. 

« So basically you have no training, no knowledge and yet here you are with the cream of the cream ? Let me guess it’s because you are a Carter ? » you don’t have the time to answer that she wake her right hand in front of you to silence you. 

« No it would be irresponsible for me to let you train with professional, but maybe you can run ? »  you only nod serving her to clap her delightfully.  

She instructed you to follow her and made you way to exterior of the compound and instruct you to run without interruption because she would know it thanks to Stark’s captor. 

It’s not the better weather, it’s raining hard but you do what you were told and start to run. 

You don’t know why she have a thing against you, but you found the running not as bad as you originally thought. 

At least you were no subject to the whispering of others and it let you time to try to remember your past life. 

Steve couldn’t believe you were a Carter, you are disappointment to say the least. You don’t have their fire, you are not a badass you are just you. An overgrown muscly woman who give the Carter a bad name and you are waisting everybody’s time with your inaptitude. He is glad that Lyanna had decided to make you run even though it’s outdoor with a heavy rain. Maybe you’ll learn the hard way that not everything is going to be handing to you. 

They are all gathered in the common room, having a welcome diner for the recruit when Stark arrive. He look around and doesn’t spot you, which is weird considering your size. 

Steve is talking with his girl so he decided to ask Bucky about you. « I don’t know Stark I’m not her babysitter. » 

Tony only rolled his eyes, and goes to Nat and Sam « Hey lovebirds do you happen to know where Danny is ? » 

They shook their heads « Oh for fuck sake, F.R.I.D.A.Y where is Danny Carter ? » he asked his A.I pinching the bridge of his nose. « Miss Carter is still running. » The conversation between Tony and F.R.I.D.A.Y had gathered the attention of the attendance.  Stark turn to Lyanna and hold her gaze « why is she still running ? » « It appears agent Lyanna Lane gave her the order to don’t stop running until told otherwise. She didn’t take a break since she started to run this morning. » 

Tony stormed out, fuming about stupid agent and pussy whipped supersoldiers. 

When he finally spotted you, you were running toward them, at good allure and made no indication to stop.

You were  cold, but didn’t stop, something in the back of your mind told you that an order was an order and you have to follow it. 

Why would the prospect of not following an order made you this anxious you didn’t know but even with all your might you still didn’t find why. 

« Hey kid, » a man called you and you stop to talk to him.  « you can stop running it’s late and you must be famished after this run. » He told you kindly, you only nod, you won’t risk to anger people like this morning again. 

Tony decided to not go back to the common room and led you to the garage.  You were amazed by the number of cars and they all seem to cost a lot. 

He only smirk at your obvious wonderment. 

He took you to his favorite place and he introduce you to the wonder of Kebab. It was his turn to be amazed when you eat 5 of them like it was nothing. 

He drove you back at the compound after that you felt less lonely but he told you that he was going to a long mission with some of the others Avengers. You thanked him for his kindness and dreaded the next days without him in your corner.

« Hey kid, » a man called you and you stop to talk to him.  « you can stop running it’s late and you must be famished after this run. » He told you kindly, you only nod, you won’t risk to anger people like this morning again. 

Tony decided to not go back to the common room and led you to the garage.  You were amazed by the number of cars and they all seem to cost a lot. 

He only smirk at your obvious wonderment. 

He took you to his favorite place and he introduce you to the wonder of Kebab. It was his turn to be amazed when you eat 5 of them like it was nothing. 

He drove you back at the compound after that you felt less lonely but he told you that he was going to a long mission with some of the others Avengers. You thanked him for his kindness and dreaded the next days without him in your corner.

Summary:

A girl lost without memories. A new threat looming in the horizon. This time it could be the end of the line.


Let it be know that James Buchanan Barnes didn’t like morning. He didn’t like it when he was young and had to go to school, didn’t like them when he had to go to work on the dock to provide for his family. Did he liked them when he was in the war ? Absolutely not! He have an inkling that he didn’t liked them in his time with H.Y.D.R.A but he didn’t know if he had early morning back then. Maybe they just put him of his fridge and then serve him his orders. He snorted at the thought, he had come to adopt a very dark humor concerning his H.Y.D.R.A’s days as a coping mechanism. Sure it made people uncomfortable but at least he was learning to accept his past.  

But back to his hate for morning, if he didn’t like them before now he positively loath them. Does he want to wake up every morning at crack ass dawn to run with his best friend ? Nope, not at all but he could indulge Steve, plus who would says no to his fucking puppy eyes, you guessed it not Bucky. But now he has to share his breakfast with Steve’s girlfriend too and oh god is she annoying well not really annoying per se, but the fact that he is in love with her and that he can’t touch her like he want because his best friend got her first annoys him. 

She a S.H.I.E.L.D agent, named Lyanna, she is a health freak with an addiction to instagram. A bleached blonde even if she says that it’s natural. « Fuckin bottle blonde » with green eyes and her boobs are so fake they defy the law of gravity.  Yes Bucky Barnes is privy to women artifice, he used to have sisters and even back in the days women teared each other apart so he know. Nat,Wanda Pepper and even Sharon love to watch Miss America with him. He is hilarious, imagine the Winter Soldier imitating contestant and shaking his hair parroting their speeches. 

He had taken to criticizes her at every opportunities so he would not succumbs to his temptation. 

Talking about the devil, her shrill voice make him wince and exchange a knowing glance with Sam who was making his famous pancake for the team.  Of all the girls and boys the punk could have choose he had to pick this one. 

Steve put his paper journal on the counter and wait for his best girl to barge in the kitchen. 

« Steven Grant Rogers, » she roared making a beeline for him « did you know ? » she asked him tastily. Her face was red and bloated from her anger and Bucky made a really visible grimace that sent Sam in a coughing fit. 

Steve’s face is the epitome of clueless, and Lyanna doesn’t let him answer « Oh don’t act like you didn’t Steven, your ex the oh so great Sharon Carter played favorite and now I have another recruit to train with the initial 11 others » she seethed. 

But Steve failed the see a problem and tell her so and Bucky knew that he just screwed himself. « You don’t see a problem with that ? Huh of course you wouldn’t. So she add her sister in the program, a sister that didn’t partake in the pre selection but that’s not a problem because she is fucking Carter and those women are above us mere mortal! Is that what you think Steven ? Are Sharon and Danny Carter above us ? Above me ? »  She grilled him and Bucky had enough, he put is coffee in the sink and glared at her « If she doesn’t have your fucking irritating voice then yes I would say she is better than you Betty. » 

Steve looked at his retracting back with a disapproving glare. « I didn’t know she had sister doll, but I’m sure you’ll be a great teacher nonetheless » he tried to soothed her. 

Upon hearing the news that a new Carter had sprout from nowhere the Avengers had made their way to the training room. 

Tony knew that you were not really a Carter, after all Peggy has been his Godmother and Sharon was like his cousin. It was him that had made your papers, and it was for him that Sharon had asked you to share your language. So he didn’t came because you were a « Carter » but because he wanted to see Steve’s girl reaction to you.  

He was one of those who didn’t like her, Sam being the other. He know perfectly that Bucky love her, it’s so painfully obvious. But then again he is Tony Stark it’s like a 6th sense for him to know who like who. And Tony know that Lyanna love him too, maybe she want to have her supersoldier sandwich. Kids these day and their Tumblr obsession for Stucky. Steve would have a heart attack if he knew how people saw him. Bucky on the other hand would love it, he has taken to take multiples women. And he would have given Playboy Tony a run for his money. 

They were all gathered by the center mat waiting fro the group of recruits to arrive. 

Steve, Lyanna and Bucky are talking quietly, and Bucky is just behind her, touching her slightly, and Tony observe them intrigued. That is a new turn in their dynamic, they are fucking he is sure of that or at list they had fuck. Steve has red cheeks and Bucky is more relaxed that he had been for a long time. And Lyanna is positively glowing by the power of being dicked by two super soldiers. 

Son of a bitch, if he had know Steve had this in him, his bisexual ass would have have a pass at him. 

But now he was in a celibacy phase, it been two years since his latest flame, he was not in a sexual phase at all. 

Popping a berry in his mouth he took a place more secluded in the sidelines to observe the trio like one would do with an animal documentary. 

Hills was the one leading the group of new meat in the compound so Lydia was with the Avengers.  She is talking with Stevie when she spots the newcomers. 

She already know them as she was one of the persons that had handpicked them. 

But when her eyes meet your forms, her entire body stiffens. 

You are at the back of the group, there is no use for you to try to hide, you are the tallest in fact you tower them all, you even seem to have the same height than Thor himself. You’re under armor kit, cling at your body and so they can see the definition of your taunt muscles. 

Lyanna is seething, how dare you wore sunglass, one thing is sure though, you are going to regret this, she is not going to miss you. She won’t let you steal her super soldiers, Steve and Bucky are hers. 

Lyanna start with a speech, of how she is proud of the new recruits, that a new horizon lay ahead of them but Tony could her eyes zooming to you every so often. 

« Danny Carter, » she called, and you made you way to stand in front of her, hands behind your back. 

‘Huh hoh this is happening’ Tony thought as he prepared himself for the show Lyanna is about to give. He know she can be a bitch but you, you are the wild variable, he don’t know you and he surely don’t know how you would react. He only hope that you can take whatever is going to be thrown your way by the blonde harpy. 

« Do you think your attire is appropriate for training ? » she questions you, circling you like a shark would a seal. 

The others recruits start snickering at your expanse. 

Bucky and Steve are proud of the intimidating persona their girl gave off.  They love strong women and Lyanna is anything but weak.

Bucky is even turned on by her attitude. 

Steve is also judging by the prism of your ‘sister’ and ‘aunt’. You don’t look anything like them maybe you have a different father or mother he don’t know. 

You are so damn tall for a woman and your built is nothing if impressive. 

« I wasn’t aware that the training would start right now. » you answer flatly. 

« Well now you are, do I have to send you an invitation for you to remove your sunglasses » she taunted you. 

You clenched your jaw, you were already fed up with her but you had promised Shar that you would be well behaved, so you complied and removed your sunglasses. The moment the shade stop hiding your eyes your hear a loud whistle. 

« Well damn Frosty you just lost your title of the most stunning eyes to baby Carter » the man snicker, but the metal arm man stop his laugh with a slap to his head « Shuddup birdbrain. » the man seethed. 

If you thought the look she was sending you before was hostile than the one you are receiving now is straight up murderous. You just raise a brow looking down to her and apparently it was the wrong move because her glare darkened even more after that. 

« I’m curious Carter, » her saccharine tone don’t bod well for you « you made it in this program thanks to your connections while the others trainees had to undergo a grueling selection. So tell us, why are you here ? » she smile kindly at you but you don’t buy it for one second. 

You look around the gym « I’m here to train. » you answer simply as if it was the most obvious thing in the world. 

« You think you are funny huh ? » 

You don’t like the way she is toying with you, and you don’t really know how to react or what the you with memories of your life would do . « I don’t know, do you ? » you shot back titling your head to the side. You internally wince when you finally process what you had just said ‘way to go Danny’ you sigh and once again anger the woman in front of you furthermore. 

She doesn’t acknowledge you remark verbally at least.  

« Right, so do you have any hand to hand combat experience ? » 

« I don’t know » you answer trustfully, you hadn’t been brief to what you would be expected to do or to know. 

The deep scowl she was sporting slip away from her face instantly and her smile is now blinding. 

 « Maybe with fire arms ? »  again you don’t know and you state it. 

The more she grill you, the more she is pleased to see that you are not really a real threat to her. 

« So basically you have no training, no knowledge and yet here you are with the cream of the cream ? Let me guess it’s because you are a Carter ? » you don’t have the time to answer that she wake her right hand in front of you to silence you. 

« No it would be irresponsible for me to let you train with professional, but maybe you can run ? »  you only nod serving her to clap her delightfully.  

She instructed you to follow her and made you way to exterior of the compound and instruct you to run without interruption because she would know it thanks to Stark’s captor. 

It’s not the better weather, it’s raining hard but you do what you were told and start to run. 

You don’t know why she have a thing against you, but you found the running not as bad as you originally thought. 

At least you were no subject to the whispering of others and it let you time to try to remember your past life. 

Steve couldn’t believe you were a Carter, you are disappointment to say the least. You don’t have their fire, you are not a badass you are just you. An overgrown muscly woman who give the Carter a bad name and you are waisting everybody’s time with your inaptitude. He is glad that Lyanna had decided to make you run even though it’s outdoor with a heavy rain. Maybe you’ll learn the hard way that not everything is going to be handing to you. 

They are all gathered in the common room, having a welcome diner for the recruit when Stark arrive. He look around and doesn’t spot you, which is weird considering your size. 

Steve is talking with his girl so he decided to ask Bucky about you. « I don’t know Stark I’m not her babysitter. » 

Tony only rolled his eyes, and goes to Nat and Sam « Hey lovebirds do you happen to know where Danny is ? » 

They shook their heads « Oh for fuck sake, F.R.I.D.A.Y where is Danny Carter ? » he asked his A.I pinching the bridge of his nose. « Miss Carter is still running. » The conversation between Tony and F.R.I.D.A.Y had gathered the attention of the attendance.  Stark turn to Lyanna and hold her gaze « why is she still running ? » « It appears agent Lyanna Lane gave her the order to don’t stop running until told otherwise. She didn’t take a break since she started to run this morning. » 

Tony stormed out, fuming about stupid agent and pussy whipped supersoldiers. 

When he finally spotted you, you were running toward them, at good allure and made no indication to stop.

You were  cold, but didn’t stop, something in the back of your mind told you that an order was an order and you have to follow it. 

Why would the prospect of not following an order made you this anxious you didn’t know but even with all your might you still didn’t find why. 

« Hey kid, » a man called you and you stop to talk to him.  « you can stop running it’s late and you must be famished after this run. » He told you kindly, you only nod, you won’t risk to anger people like this morning again. 

Tony decided to not go back to the common room and led you to the garage.  You were amazed by the number of cars and they all seem to cost a lot. 

He only smirk at your obvious wonderment. 

He took you to his favorite place and he introduce you to the wonder of Kebab. It was his turn to be amazed when you eat 5 of them like it was nothing. 

He drove you back at the compound after that you felt less lonely but he told you that he was going to a long mission with some of the others Avengers. You thanked him for his kindness and dreaded the next days without him in your corner.
